briefdescription.para: This Stack is almost impossible to kill and fool. All undefined behaviour memory accesses will be spoted and reported.

detaileddescription.para:
This Stack is almost impossible to kill and fool. All undefined behaviour memory accesses will be spoted and reported.
Aleksandr Dremov
Prerequisites. Before including .h file, you need to define StackElementDump(FILE, VALUE) and StackElementType. Example: #define StackElementDump(FILE, VALUE) {fprintf(FILE, "%g", VALUE);} #define StackElementType double The system must have uint32_t type available
Stack can be fully moved in memory during reallocations
Aleksandr Dremov, MIPT 2020
